Articles.Content:
Hi. I have had several CTD's with my modded KSP. Basically, it will crash some of the time when switching between screens (VAB to main screen three times) (Main screen to launch pad once). I can usually play normally for a little while (including going between screens), but sometimes it just crashes unexpectedly. Does anyone know what might be causing this? and more importantly how to fix it?

Here are a couple of error logs:

Log 1

Log 2
If there is any other information that could be helpful, please let me know. I'm not sure how to read those logs so I'm not sure if everything needed is there.

You're at the very limit of the amount of memory you can use, so the small amount that the game needs when switching scenes is enough to send you over. Either get Active Texture Management or remove part mods that you're not using.
